name: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid
hydrogen peroxide
sodium hydroxide
and glycerine
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), sodium hydroxide (CAS Reg. No. 1310-73-2), and glycerine (CAS Reg. No. 56-81-5).
